mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT g.gid, g.sku, g.sku_name, g.goods_specification, g.cover_image_uri, g.goods_unit, og.order_qty qty FROM ord_goods_info og LEFT JOIN gds_goods g ON g.sku = og.sku WHERE og.ord_no = #{orderNumber} AND (og.is_gift IS NULL OR og.is_gift = FALSE)
